FIX-ATOMIC-INHERITANCE.title: Atomic Inheritance Resolution
FIX-ATOMIC-INHERITANCE.instruction:
Implement Spec TD-160: Atomic Inheritance Resolution. Use SettlementSystem and LegacySettlementAccount to ensure zero-sum integrity during agent death.

FIX-SEVERANCE-WATERFALL.title: Liquidation Waterfall Protocol
FIX-SEVERANCE-WATERFALL.instruction:
Implement Spec TD-187: Liquidation Waterfall Protocol. Ensure employee severance (3y) and wages (3m) are prioritized over other debts.
